%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.label: TextBlock2
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.text:
This guided process can be used to collect key administrative information to support order delivery process

  • This process is executed before an order is actually submitted to fulfillment (think of this as an enrichment process)
  • This process can be executed by a service delivery agent (fulfillment operations) or a customer directly
  • The input parameter: customer order identifier (Salesforce Id)
  • The process allows to capture:
    • Contact details (for administrative and technical aspects)
    • Appointment details (preferred date and timeslot)
    • Billing details or preferences
    • Any other remarks
  • Once the information is captured, it can be reflected back to Salesforce (nothing is configured in this omniscript the demonstration purposes)


For more information: refer to PLACEHOLDER_URL
